00385 void RemoteFileDialog::OnButtonUpFolder( wxCommandEvent& event )
00386 {
00387     event.Skip();
00388 
00389     //wxPathFormat pathFormat = GetCurrentPathFormat();
00390 
00391     int numDirs = m_currentPath.GetDirCount();
00392 
00393     if(numDirs > 0)
00394     {
00395         wxString currPath = m_currentPath.GetPath(false, wxPATH_UNIX);
00396  
00397         // if we're not at a user's home directory, get rid of the last
00398         // directory in the path
00399         if(currPath != "~")
00400         {
00401             m_currentPath.RemoveDir(numDirs - 1);
00402         }
00403     }
00404     wxString path = m_currentPath.GetPath();
00405     ShowDirectory(m_currentPath.GetPath(false, wxPATH_UNIX));
00406 }

00447 bool RemoteFileDialog::ShowDirectory(wxString dirname, bool refresh, bool showHidden)
00448 {
00449     m_currentPath.AssignDir(dirname);
00450     m_pathBox->SetValue(dirname);   
00451 
00452     m_list->ClearAll();
00453 
00454     DirListing dl;  
00455     if(!m_network->GetDirListing(dirname, dl, refresh, showHidden))
00456     {
00457         return false;
00458     }
00459 
00460     m_currentDirListing = dl;
00461     FillListView();
00462 
00463     return true;
00464 }
00465 
00474 void RemoteFileDialog::FillListView()
00475 {
00476     // disables VS's 4018 warning: "signed/unsigned mismatch" relating to the GetCount() comparison
00477 #pragma warning( disable : 4018)
00478 
00479     m_list->ClearAll();
00480 
00481     wxSortedArrayString sortedDirs(m_currentDirListing.dirNames);
00482     wxSortedArrayString sortedFiles(m_currentDirListing.fileNames);
00483 
00484     m_currentDirs.Clear();
00485     m_currentFiles.Clear();
00486 
00487     // should be getting just the name of the directory itself from Networking, so I 
00488     // can insert it directly into the listview and give it the folder icon
00489     for(int i = 0; i < sortedDirs.GetCount(); i++)
00490     {
00491         m_list->InsertItem(m_list->GetItemCount(), sortedDirs[i], ICON_FOLDERCLOSED);
00492         m_currentDirs.Add(sortedDirs[i]);
00493     }
00494     
00495 
00496     //TwoDStringVector dsv = m_fileExtensionList[m_currentFilterType];
00497     
00498     wxArrayString currentExtensionList = m_fileExtensionList[m_currentFilterIndex];
00499     
00500     wxSortedArrayString currentFileSet;
00501     
00502     for(int j = 0; j < currentExtensionList.Count(); j++)
00503     {
00504         wxString currentExtensionType = currentExtensionList[j];
00505 
00506         int currentExtensionIconNumber;
00507 
00508         if(m_iconExtensionMapping.find(currentExtensionType) != m_iconExtensionMapping.end())
00509         {
00510             currentExtensionIconNumber = m_iconExtensionMapping[currentExtensionType];
00511         }
00512         else
00513         {
00514             currentExtensionIconNumber = m_iconExtensionMapping["DEFAULTFILEEXTENSION"];
00515         }
00516 
00517         for(int i = 0; i < sortedFiles.GetCount(); i++)
00518         {
00519             wxFileName currentName(sortedFiles[i]);
00520             wxString currentFileExtension = currentName.GetExt();
00521             if( (currentFileExtension == currentExtensionType) ||
00522                 (currentExtensionType == "*.*"))
00523             {
00524                 wxString file = currentName.GetFullName();
00525                 m_currentFiles.Add(file);
00526                 currentFileSet.Add(file);
00527             }
00528         }
00529 
00530         for(int k = 0; k < currentFileSet.Count(); k++)
00531         {
00532             m_list->InsertItem(m_list->GetItemCount(), currentFileSet[k], currentExtensionIconNumber);
00533         }
00534         currentFileSet.Clear();
00535     }
00536 
00537 
00538     m_pathBox->SetSelection(0,0);
00539     m_list->SetFocus();
00540 
00541     // turn the size_t warning back on
00542 #pragma warning( default : 4018 )
00543 }

00563 // save the information for saving a file

00641 bool RemoteFileDialog::Prepare(bool open, wxString filterString)//FileDisplayType displayType)
00642 {
00643     m_openMode = open;
00644 
00645     
00646     m_comboFiletypes->Clear();
00647 
00648 
00649     wxStringTokenizer filterTokenizer;
00650     filterTokenizer.SetString(filterString, "|");
00651 
00652     wxStringTokenizer fileTypeTokenizer;
00653 
00654     wxArrayString as;
00655 
00656     wxFileName extGrabber;
00657 
00658     m_fileExtensionList.Clear();
00659 
00660     m_currentFilterIndex = 0;
00661 
00662     while(filterTokenizer.HasMoreTokens())
00663     {
00664         wxString comboText = filterTokenizer.GetNextToken();
00665         m_comboFiletypes->Append(comboText);
00666         wxString fileTypeString = filterTokenizer.GetNextToken();
00667 
00668         fileTypeTokenizer.SetString(fileTypeString, ";");
00669 
00670         while(fileTypeTokenizer.HasMoreTokens())
00671         {
00672             wxString typeString = fileTypeTokenizer.GetNextToken();
00673             if(typeString == "*.*")
00674             {
00675                 as.Add(typeString);
00676             }
00677             else
00678             {
00679                 extGrabber.Assign(typeString);
00680                 as.Add(extGrabber.GetExt());
00681             }
00682             
00683             extGrabber.Clear();
00684         }
00685 
00686         m_fileExtensionList.Add(as);
00687         as.Clear();
00688     }
00689 
00690     if(m_openMode)
00691     {
00692         SetTitle("Open File");
00693         m_buttonOpen->SetLabel("Open");
00694     }
00695     else
00696     {
00697         wxString title = "Save File As";
00698 
00699         if(filterString.Find("*.cpj") != wxNOT_FOUND)
00700         {
00701             title = "Save New Project";
00702         }
00703 
00704         SetTitle(title);
00705         m_buttonOpen->SetLabel("Save");
00706     }
00707 
00708 
00709     m_comboFiletypes->SetSelection(0);
00710 
00711     m_filterAllFilesIndex = m_comboFiletypes->FindString("All files (*.*)");
00712 
00713 
00714     //wxPathFormat format = GetCurrentPathFormat();
00715 
00716     wxString path = m_currentPath.GetPath(false, wxPATH_UNIX);
00717     m_txtFilename->SetValue(wxEmptyString);
00718     return ShowDirectory(path);
00719 }

00730 
00731 
00732 void RemoteFileDialog::ItemActivated()
00733 {
00734     wxString userFileName = m_txtFilename->GetValue();
00735 
00736     wxFileName fn;
00737 
00738     int dirResult = m_currentDirListing.dirNames.Index(userFileName); //m_currentDirs.Index(text);
00739 
00740     // the item name isn't a directory
00741     if(dirResult == wxNOT_FOUND)
00742     {       
00743 
00744         // if we're trying to save a file and the filter isn't "All files (*.*)
00745         if(!m_openMode && (m_currentFilterIndex != m_filterAllFilesIndex))
00746         {
00747             fn.SetFullName(userFileName);
00748             wxString ext = fn.GetExt();
00749 
00750             if(ext == wxEmptyString)
00751             {
00752                 // retrieves the appropriate set of extensions for the 
00753                 // selected filter and uses the first one as the default extension
00754                 fn.SetExt(m_fileExtensionList[m_currentFilterIndex][0]);
00755 
00756                 userFileName = fn.GetFullName();
00757             }
00758 
00759         }
00760 
00761         int fileResult = m_currentDirListing.fileNames.Index(userFileName);//m_currentFiles.Index(text);
00762 
00763         // and it's not a file either
00764         if(fileResult == wxNOT_FOUND)
00765         {
00766             // trying to open a non-existent file
00767             if(m_openMode)
00768             {
00769                 wxString errorMessage = "\"" + userFileName + "\" was not found.  Please enter or select a valid file name.";
00770                 
00771                 wxMessageBox(errorMessage, "Open", wxOK | wxICON_EXCLAMATION);
00772                 return;
00773             }
00774             // trying to save a file and it's a new file
00775             else
00776             {
00777                 StoreFileName(userFileName);
00778             }
00779         }
00780         else
00781         {
00782             // filename found, open it
00783             if(m_openMode)
00784             {
00785                 StoreFileName(userFileName);
00786             }
00787             // file already exists - confirm overwrite
00788             else
00789             {
00790                 wxString confirmMessage = userFileName + " already exists.  Do you want to replace it?";
00791                 int result = wxMessageBox(confirmMessage, "Save As", wxYES_NO | wxICON_QUESTION);
00792 
00793                 if(result == wxYES)
00794                 {
00795                     StoreFileName(userFileName);
00796                 }
00797                 else
00798                 {
00799                     return;
00800                 }
00801             }
00802         }
00803     }   
00804     else
00805     {
00806         // call ShowDirectory w/ new directory
00807         m_currentPath.AppendDir(userFileName);
00808 
00809         ShowDirectory(m_currentPath.GetPath(false, wxPATH_UNIX));
00810     }
00811     m_txtFilename->Clear();
00812 }

00826 void RemoteFileDialog::OnFileTypeSelected( wxCommandEvent& event )
00827 {
00828     // Insert custom code here
00829     event.Skip();
00830 
00831     int selectionIndex = m_comboFiletypes->GetSelection();
00832 
00833     if(selectionIndex != m_currentFilterIndex)
00834     {
00835         m_currentFilterIndex = selectionIndex;
00836         FillListView();
00837     }
00838 }
00839 
00850 void RemoteFileDialog::OnButtonRefresh(wxCommandEvent &event)
00851 {
00852     wxString path = m_currentPath.GetPath(false, wxPATH_UNIX);
00853     ShowDirectory(path, true);
00854 }
